sentences.sContent: The yellow parts has small oval-shaped protrusions, each with one or two “pinhole” depressions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The yellow parts has small oval-shaped protrusions, each with one or two “pinhole” depressions.
sentences.sCn: 黄色部分有小的椭圆形突出，每个突出又有一到二个“针孔”状凹陷。

sentences.sContent: For their next work, they'll be looking at how to replicate the intricate grooves and pinhole depressions.
sentences.sContent_eng: For their next work, they'll be looking at how to replicate the intricate grooves and pinhole depressions.
sentences.sCn: 至于下一步的工作，他们要研究怎么模拟复杂的沟槽和针孔凹陷。

sentences.sContent: They also abandoned using any corrective lenses, firing the X-ray pulse through a pinhole and then collecting the diffracted rays after they pass through the sample.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also abandoned using any corrective lenses, firing the X-ray pulse through a pinhole and then collecting the diffracted rays after they pass through the sample.
sentences.sCn: 他们也放弃使用任何矫正透镜，而是通过一个针孔发射X光射线，然后采集经过样品后的衍射光线。

trans.tranOther: a very small hole in something, especially one made by a pin
